# Overview

This vignette shows how to fit and inspect a linear model using linreg() from Lab4.

## Quick start
```{r setup}
library(Lab4)
data(iris)

fit <- linreg(Petal.Length ~ Sepal.Length + Sepal.Width, data = iris)
```

# Methods

## print()
```{r print}
print(fit)
```

## plot()
```{r plot}
plot(fit)
```

## resid()
```{r resid}
resid(fit)
```

## pred()
```{r pred}
pred(fit)
```

## coef()
```{r coef}
coef(fit)
```

## summary()
```{r summary}
summary(fit)
```
